name: io.github.olgasafonova/nordic-registry-mcp-server
description: Access Nordic business registries (Norway, Denmark, Finland, Sweden). 23 tools.

environmentVariables.description: Bolagsverket OAuth2 client ID (only needed for Sweden tools)
environmentVariables.name: BOLAGSVERKET_CLIENT_ID

environmentVariables.description: Bolagsverket OAuth2 client secret (only needed for Sweden tools)
environmentVariables.name: BOLAGSVERKET_CLIENT_SECRET
